name: Switchy Frogs - A Jumpy Frog Game where 4 Sweet Froggy Jumpers Cross the Tiles
name_original: Switchy Frogs - A Jumpy Frog Game where 4 Sweet Froggy Jumpers Cross the Tiles
description:
Switchy Frogs is a game for the mind. Improve the attention, speed and flexibility of your brain with this fun to play simple game.

How to play;
- Your goal is to MOVE the frogs onto the tiles above
- The frogs take turns from right to left
- Game over if a frog steps on its own color
- Tap on or below a tile to move the next frog onto it

Credits;
Music by Eric Matyas (www.soundimage.org)
